import axios from "axios"; import { useState } from "react"; export default function News(){ var [news,setNews]=useState([]) function getNewsByCategory(e){ alert(e.target.value) axios.get(`https://saurav.tech/NewsAPI/top-headlines/category/${e.target.value}/in.json`) .then((res)=>{ setNews(res.data.articles) }) } return( <>
{news.map((x)=>
{x.title}
)}
); }
